intro: Microsemma balansae, commonly known as the Balansae microsemma, is a rare and enigmatic plant species native to specific regions in Southeast Asia. It belongs to the family Araliaceae, which includes a variety of flowering plants. The plant is characterized by its small, delicate leaves and unique floral structures that are adapted to its specific ecological niche. It thrives in moist, shaded environments, often found in tropical rainforests. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, Microsemma balansae is considered a species of conservation concern.
